00158         
00159         private static long stringToStyle(String _style)
00160         {
00161                 if (_style.equals("EDITABLE")) return Field.EDITABLE;
00162                 if (_style.equals("BOTTOM")) return Field.FIELD_BOTTOM;
00163                 if (_style.equals("HCENTER")) return Field.FIELD_HCENTER;
00164                 if (_style.equals("LEFT")) return Field.FIELD_LEFT;
00165                 if (_style.equals("RIGHT")) return Field.FIELD_RIGHT;
00166                 if (_style.equals("TOP")) return Field.FIELD_TOP;
00167                 if (_style.equals("VCENTER")) return Field.FIELD_VCENTER;
00168                 if (_style.equals("FOCUSABLE")) return Field.FOCUSABLE;
00169                 if (_style.equals("HIGHLIGHT_FOCUS")) return Field.HIGHLIGHT_FOCUS;
00170                 if (_style.equals("HIGHLIGHT_SELECT")) return Field.HIGHLIGHT_SELECT;
00171                 if (_style.equals("READONLY")) return Field.READONLY;
00172                 if (_style.equals("USE_ALL_HEIGHT")) return Field.USE_ALL_HEIGHT;
00173                 if (_style.equals("USE_ALL_WIDTH")) return Field.USE_ALL_WIDTH;
00174                 
00175                 return Field.FIELD_LEFT;
00176         }
00177         
00178         public static long stringListToStyle(String _styleList)
00179         {
00180                 long retValue = Field.FIELD_LEFT;
00181                 String[] styles = StringUtilities.stringToKeywords(_styleList);
00182                 for (int i = 0; i < styles.length; i++)
00183                 {
00184                         retValue |= UIHelper.stringToStyle(styles[i]);
00185                 }
00186                 return retValue;
00187         }
00188         
00189         private static long stringToFontStyle(String _style)
00190         {
00191                 // ANTIALIAS not supported on all builds
00192                 // if (_style.equals("ANTIALIAS_STANDARD")) return Font.ANTIALIAS_STANDARD;
00193                 // if (_style.equals("ANTIALIAS_LOW_RES")) return Font.ANTIALIAS_LOW_RES;
00194 
00195                 if (_style.equals("ANTIALIAS_NONE")) return Font.ANTIALIAS_NONE;
00196                 if (_style.equals("ANTIALIAS_SUBPIXEL")) return Font.ANTIALIAS_SUBPIXEL;
00197                 if (_style.equals("APPLICATION")) return Font.APPLICATION;
00198                 if (_style.equals("COLORED_OUTLINE_EFFECT")) return Font.COLORED_OUTLINE_EFFECT;
00199                 if (_style.equals("DOTTED_UNDERLINED")) return Font.DOTTED_UNDERLINED;
00200                 if (_style.equals("DROP_SHADOW_RIGHT_EFFECT")) return Font.DROP_SHADOW_RIGHT_EFFECT;
00201                 if (_style.equals("EMBOSSED_EFFECT")) return Font.EMBOSSED_EFFECT;
00202                 if (_style.equals("ENGRAVED_EFFECT")) return Font.ENGRAVED_EFFECT;
00203                 if (_style.equals("ITALIC")) return Font.ITALIC;
00204                 if (_style.equals("PLAIN")) return Font.PLAIN;
00205                 if (_style.equals("UNDERLINED")) return Font.UNDERLINED;
00206                 
00207                 return Font.PLAIN;
00208         }
00209 
00210         public static int stringListToFontStyle(String _styleList)
00211         {
00212                 int retValue = Font.PLAIN;
00213                 String[] styles = StringUtilities.stringToKeywords(_styleList);
00214                 for (int i = 0; i < styles.length; i++)
00215                 {
00216                         retValue |= UIHelper.stringToFontStyle(styles[i]);
00217                 }
00218                 return retValue;
00219         }
00220         
00221         public static Font getFont(int _size, int _style)
00222         {
00223         FontFamily fontFamily[] = FontFamily.getFontFamilies(); 
00224         return fontFamily[1].getFont(FontFamily.CBTF_FONT, _size).derive(_style); 
00225         }
